description:
Company and Position

Our client is a leading out of home media company. They are expanding their sales force and are looking for a salesperson who is interested in a starting a career in media sales. Our client offers a salary of between $60K - $65. The total could be +$100K based on performance. They will provide training and an account list. Their offices are located on Park Avenue in midtown.


Requirements

1-3 years of sales or account management experience (media experience is preferred, but not required).

Bachelor’s Degree

qualifications.required: 1-3 years of sales or account management experience (media experience is preferred, but not required).
